block__about_answeropedia.text: Answeropedia is like Wikipedia, only for questions and answers. You ask a question and get one complete, comprehensive and competent answer from the community.
block__about_answeropedia.title: About Answeropedia

how_it_works.step_1: You ask a question about any category of interest to you
how_it_works.step_2: We find a specialist who can give a competent answer
how_it_works.step_3: You receive an answer to the email
how_it_works.title: How it works?

share_link.note: You can help the Answeropedia project by simply sharing your link with your friends.
share_link.title: Share link

modal_ask.note: Ask questions in a form understandable to real people - they will answer, not search robots.
modal_ask.title: New question

modal_signup.note: By signing up, you agree to our terms of use, privacy policy, and cookie policy.
modal_signup.title: Sign up

about.msg_1: The sandbox is a place to get new questions that have not yet been answered.
about.msg_2: As soon as the question has a comprehensive answer and several categories, it is transferred to the main list.
about.title: What is a «sandbox»?

settings.avatar__note: It is advisable to use your real photo as an avatar - this causes more confidence among users.
settings.real_name_note: The real name causes more trust than @username. It will be shown next to your edits and in the Top authors.
settings.signature_note: Enter a signature describing your professional skills and knowledge.
settings.signature_placeholder: For example: Professor of Psychology, entrepreneur, novice poet
settings.site_note: Enter the address of your website or page on the social network.
settings.title: Settings
